titleStmt.title: The dreadfulness of the plague. Or A sermon preached in the parish-church of St. John the Evangelist, December 6th. being a day of public fasting. By Jos. Hunter M.A. and minister in York
titleStmt.author: Hunter, Josiah, minister in York.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Stphen Bulkley, and are to be sold by Francis Mawbarne,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf dated Jan. 22. 1665.
Reproduction of the original in the University College Library, Oxford.
